author: potuz
content: where can I get a chart with historical base_fee prices since 1559?

author: pietjepuk

author: kommstar
content: Is spinning up another chain a way to scale Ethereum?

author: treyzania
content: it depends on what you mean by that, you might want to read this article https://vitalik.ca/general/2021/05/23/scaling.html

author: kommstar
content: Imeant just taking the current state and deploying a completely separate chain. So execution could happen in this other chain (discretely)  but we could bridge assets between them.

author: treyzania
content: economically speaking that would duplicate all of the assets on both ledgers, like the bcash fork off bitcoin but more
